casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Donald Wayne BLACK No. 287P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 24, 2018 Patrick M. Megaro, Attorney at Law, for Black, Donald Derrick Mertz, Assistant Attorney General, William R. West, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina *380ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 5th of September 2018 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of October 2018."
